name: Out of Bed
description:
I wanted to give observation duty a try. 

This game you play as child left alone in a house you believe to be haunted. You spend the night seeking anomalies in hopes of having evidence to tell your parents!

WASD- to Move

Left Click- to tag anomalies and fix them

Shift - to run

This project is not done. It is a demo that I intend to continue adding more to but at its current state it is a proof of concept, a taste of more to come and a stable enough game to play.  Critiques are encouraged! 

Support me on Patreon if you like~ 

https://www.patreon.com/TheBep
